page.title: 03COMMUNITY BUS
page.content: There is a small bus called the Community Bus that goes round the small villages where the ordinary service buses no longer go.The idea came into being after rural buses were cut and many elderly and non car owners became cut off. The council subsidizes the buses and people can get special passes like on ordinary buses. The bus is driven by a member of the public who holds a PSV license. These buses take people to the towns specially on market days(Monday in Aylsham and Thursday in North Walsham)
